meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an aphrodisiac.
meanings.sent1: The chef added an aphrodisiacal ingredient to the dish to make it more appealing.
meanings.sent2: The perfume had an aphrodisiacal effect on those who smelled it.
meanings.sent3: The love potion was said to have aphrodisiacal properties, but it just made people sneeze.
meanings.sent4: His smooth voice had an aphrodisiacal power over the audience, captivating them completely.
meanings.sent5: The romantic setting by the beach had an aphrodisiacal charm, making the couple feel more in love.

meanings.definition: Having the quality of arousing sexual desire.
meanings.sent1: The movie had an aphrodisiacal scene that made the audience blush.
meanings.sent2: The lingerie she wore had an aphrodisiacal effect on her partner.
meanings.sent3: The spicy food had an unexpectedly aphrodisiacal impact on their evening.
meanings.sent4: The music had an aphrodisiacal rhythm that made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent5: The romantic novel was filled with aphrodisiacal descriptions that stirred the readers' emotions.

meanings.sent1: The exotic fruit was rumored to have aphrodisiacal properties.
meanings.sent2: The couple enjoyed a dinner with aphrodisiacal foods to set the mood.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's jokes had an unexpectedly aphrodisiacal effect on the audience.
meanings.sent4: The painting had an aphrodisiacal allure that drew viewers in.
meanings.sent5: The romantic movie had an aphrodisiacal storyline that kept viewers engaged.
